snippet: Market indicators closed with their first gains of the week after President Obama suggested that averting a January bundle of tax increases and spending cuts would not be difficult.
abstract: Stocks rise after Pres Obama suggests that averting a January bundle of tax increases and spending cuts will not be difficult.
lead_paragraph: Market indicators closed with their first gains of the week after President Obama suggested that averting a January bundle of tax increases and spending cuts would not be difficult.

headline.seo: Stocks Close Higher After Remarks by President
headline.main: Remarks by Obama Help Give Markets a Lift
headline.print_headline: Remarks by Obama Help Give Markets a Lift
